pages.title: Player Detector
pages.text: You know people who build gigantic constructions out of $(item)Redstone$() just to open an oversized door. And then they trigger it with an unsightly $(item)Pressure Plate$().$(br)The Player Detector, on the other hand, is able to sense your presence - or that of other players - at a distance and sends out a corresponding $(thing)redstone signal$().$(br)Much better.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Range: 10 blocks.$(br)Emits a full strength signal, if the player who placed it is detected, otherwise 8.
